title: 1.62的MC崩溃
author: wq57
txt_content:

replies.author: chuyimo
replies.txt_content:
A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment  =   一个致命的错误已检测到Java运行时环境

Windows XP Build 2600 Service Pack 3  =  Windows XP生成2600的Service Pack 3

你的系统版本低了  造成JAVA 的游戏环境出错了  不支持1.6.2了

重装JAVA 试试
